div.p: 39. Q. VVhat is a perſon to doe at the time of the Sacrament?

A. He is
1. to meditate of the greatneſſe of his ſinnes which pierced Chriſt.Zach. 12.10.
2 To meditate of the great and wonderful love of God in Chriſt.Ioh. 3.16. Rom. 5.8.
3 To meditate of that bitter and accurſed death that Chriſt ſuffered to make peace for his ſoule.
4 To lay hold on Ieſus Chriſt offered unto him,Mat. 26.28. Phil. 3.10, 11. by faith.
